languages.text: Those chosen to become Astropaths undergo the ritual of Soul Binding that purifies their body and soul. The ceremony leaves Astropaths blind, yet they become bound to the Emperor and are trained to send their thoughts across the galaxy via the medium of the warp.
languages.original_text: Избранные, чтобы стать Астропатами, проходят ритуал Связывания Душ, который очищает их тело и дух. Церемония ослепляет Астропатов, но зато они обретают связь с Императором, и их обучают посылать свои мысли сквозь варп на другие концы галактики.

traits.locale_text: Those chosen to become Astropaths undergo the ritual of Soul Binding that purifies their body and soul. The ceremony leaves Astropaths blind, yet they become bound to the Emperor and are trained to send their thoughts across the galaxy via the medium of the warp.

Those chosen to become Astropaths undergo the ritual of Soul Binding that purifies their body and soul. The ceremony leaves Astropaths blind, yet they become bound to the Emperor and are trained to send their thoughts across the galaxy via the medium of the warp.

languages.text: Избранные, чтобы стать Астропатами, проходят ритуал Связывания Душ, который очищает их тело и дух. Церемония ослепляет Астропатов, но зато они обретают связь с Императором, и их обучают посылать свои мысли сквозь варп на другие концы галактики.

Diejenigen, die man als angehende Astropathen auswählt, durchlaufen das Ritual der Seelenbindung, das ihren Körper und ihre Seele reinigt. Die Zeremonie macht Astropathen blind, aber sie werden an den Imperator gebunden und dazu ausgebildet, ihre Gedanken über das Medium des Warp durch die Galaxie zu schicken.
languages.original_text: Those chosen to become Astropaths undergo the ritual of Soul Binding that purifies their body and soul. The ceremony leaves Astropaths blind, yet they become bound to the Emperor and are trained to send their thoughts across the galaxy via the medium of the warp.

traits.locale_text: Diejenigen, die man als angehende Astropathen auswählt, durchlaufen das Ritual der Seelenbindung, das ihren Körper und ihre Seele reinigt. Die Zeremonie macht Astropathen blind, aber sie werden an den Imperator gebunden und dazu ausgebildet, ihre Gedanken über das Medium des Warp durch die Galaxie zu schicken.

languages.text: Les aspirants astropathes doivent se soumettre au rituel d'Attachement de l'Âme, qui purifie leur corps et leur âme. À l'issue de la cérémonie, les astropathes sont aveugles mais ils liés à l'Empereur et entraînés à envoyer leurs pensées à travers la galaxie par l'intermédiaire du Warp.
languages.original_text: Those chosen to become Astropaths undergo the ritual of Soul Binding that purifies their body and soul. The ceremony leaves Astropaths blind, yet they become bound to the Emperor and are trained to send their thoughts across the galaxy via the medium of the warp.

traits.locale_text: Les aspirants astropathes doivent se soumettre au rituel d'Attachement de l'Âme, qui purifie leur corps et leur âme. À l'issue de la cérémonie, les astropathes sont aveugles mais ils liés à l'Empereur et entraînés à envoyer leurs pensées à travers la galaxie par l'intermédiaire du Warp.

languages.text: 那些被选中成为星语者的人，需要进行灵魂结合仪式，净化他们的身体和灵魂。这个仪式会让星语者彻底失明，但他们的灵魂会与帝皇产生共鸣。在这之后，他们会接受训练，将他们的思维通过亚空间传输至银河系的另一侧。
languages.original_text: Those chosen to become Astropaths undergo the ritual of Soul Binding that purifies their body and soul. The ceremony leaves Astropaths blind, yet they become bound to the Emperor and are trained to send their thoughts across the galaxy via the medium of the warp.

traits.locale_text: 那些被选中成为星语者的人，需要进行灵魂结合仪式，净化他们的身体和灵魂。这个仪式会让星语者彻底失明，但他们的灵魂会与帝皇产生共鸣。在这之后，他们会接受训练，将他们的思维通过亚空间传输至银河系的另一侧。

languages.text: 感応通信官（アストロパス）に選ばれた者はソウル・バインディングの儀式を受け、肉体と魂を浄化する。この儀式により感応通信官は盲目となるが、皇帝と結ばれ、<歪み>を媒介として銀河に思いを伝える訓練を受ける。
languages.original_text: Those chosen to become Astropaths undergo the ritual of Soul Binding that purifies their body and soul. The ceremony leaves Astropaths blind, yet they become bound to the Emperor and are trained to send their thoughts across the galaxy via the medium of the warp.

traits.locale_text: 感応通信官（アストロパス）に選ばれた者はソウル・バインディングの儀式を受け、肉体と魂を浄化する。この儀式により感応通信官は盲目となるが、皇帝と結ばれ、<歪み>を媒介として銀河に思いを伝える訓練を受ける。

languages.text: Los elegidos para convertirse en Astrópatas se someten al ritual de la Vinculación del Alma, que purifican sus cuerpos y sus almas. La ceremonia arrebata la visión a los Astrópatas, pero los vincula al Emperador y les permite enviar sus pensamientos por toda la galaxia a través de la disformidad.
languages.original_text: Those chosen to become Astropaths undergo the ritual of Soul Binding that purifies their body and soul. The ceremony leaves Astropaths blind, yet they become bound to the Emperor and are trained to send their thoughts across the galaxy via the medium of the warp.

traits.locale_text: Los elegidos para convertirse en Astrópatas se someten al ritual de la Vinculación del Alma, que purifican sus cuerpos y sus almas. La ceremonia arrebata la visión a los Astrópatas, pero los vincula al Emperador y les permite enviar sus pensamientos por toda la galaxia a través de la disformidad.
